title: Help installing and deleting league of legends PLS!!!
body: So the other day i installed windows 10 and my league of legends couldnt launch because of some rads errors and other things...so i went back to windows 7 and this is where it all started. I tryed to launch league but it didnt and threw nme some rads errors again but i deleted all shortcuts and i tryed to delete and install the game again, and when i went to control panel to delete league of legends it says that they cant find where the files been...so i managed to delete league with CCleaner but i still cant install the game because it says that the older version of league of legends cant be removed and so i contact technical support. Please someone help i have no idea how to fix this...i cant play my favourite game {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You may have corrupt and leftover files from your previous installations. You should be able to resolve this by completing a clean reinstallation with our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) After installing the app, run it and check the boxes for 'reinstall' and 'clean uninstall'. Hit start and leave it to do its thing!

If you still have issues after using the HRT, please let me know.
